info.name: Global Quota
info.summary: Define a global storage quota for Nextcloud instances
info.description:
This app allows administrators to define a **global storage quota** for the entire Nextcloud instance, regardless of the underlying storage (local, S3 or other external backends).
- Shows total, used, and free space in the admin settings. - Provides the `occ globalquota:recalc` command to recalculate and precache global usage. - Exposes a secure admin-only API endpoint with quota, usage and free space values.
Ideal for setups using external storage like S3 where the default Nextcloud storage graph is not available.
info.author: David Camejo
